articles.title: Boston City Council District 1 race: Gabriela Coletta Zapata
articles.description:
"I believe in the power of local government because I’ve seen its impact up close."

articles.title: Boston City Council at-large race: Frank Baker
articles.description:
"With 37 years of experience working in the city, including 12 on the City Council, my experience far outweighs that of anyone running at this time, including the incumbents."

articles.title: Boston City Council at-large race: Julia Mejia
articles.description:
"Having grown-up low-income with an undocumented mother affords me the empathy necessary to move with urgency around the issues our residents face."

articles.title: Boston City Council at-large race: Ruthzee Louijeune
articles.description:

articles.title: Boston City Council at-large Race: Alexandra Valdez
articles.description:

articles.title: Boston City Council at-large race: Marvin Mathelier
articles.description:

articles.title: Boston City Council at-large race: Henry Santana
articles.description:
"I believe housing is a human right, and Boston should lead the nation in showing how cities can protect that right while continuing to flourish."

articles.title: Boston City Council at-large Race: Will Onuoha
articles.description:
"As your City Councilor, I will push for bold, people-first policies that protect our neighborhoods, prevent displacement, create workforce housing, and expand access to homeownership."

articles.title: Boston City Council at-large race: Erin Murphy
articles.description:
"Whether it’s families priced out, seniors feeling isolated, or city workers commuting an hour each way, too many Bostonians feel like the ground keeps shifting under their feet."

articles.title: Did you follow the local news this week? Take our Greater Boston news quiz.
articles.description:
